Reviews.Title: To clarify since THIS IS A 720p max res.
Reviews.Author: Ryan Park
Reviews.Content: To clarify since THIS IS A 720p max res. I didn't see it posted anywhere on here till I google'd the model number.

Reviews.Title: Great tv performace, with warranty entanglements
Reviews.Author: DAN MO
Reviews.Content: Just received order and am DISAPPOINTED because as YOU CAN CLEARLY SEE on right side of product picture a red badge Clearly STATES 3 year limited warranty, but not so in paperwork included in shipment---which says 1 year limited warranted, IHATE LIARS.Now to the television itself works great and looks great, most colors look great except for some minor adjustments. Spot on with hdmi connections, running ok for 2 hours. WHATABARGAIN
